Sentencas: The present study focused on the exergoenvironmental analysis via Life Cycle Assessment and emergy based evaluation of a multigeneration system of hydrogen, carbon dioxide, and power through biomass gasification (Sawdust).
Titulo: A comprehensive exergoenvironment-emergoeconomic-emergoenvironment based analysis of hybrid steam biomass gasification and solid oxide fuel cell system for a multigeneration system

Sentencas: In this regards, energy, exergy, exergoeconomic, exergoenvironmental, emer-goeconomic, and emergoenvironmental modeled in MATLAB software for a considered multigeneration system, is to employ hydrogen in a solid oxide fuel cell to increase power yield and to generate hydrogen and CO2 as output products.
Titulo: A comprehensive exergoenvironment-emergoeconomic-emergoenvironment based analysis of hybrid steam biomass gasification and solid oxide fuel cell system for a multigeneration system

Sentencas: The Life Cycle Assessment for exergoenvironmental analysis has been performed in SIMA Pro based on Ecoindicator 99.
Titulo: A comprehensive exergoenvironment-emergoeconomic-emergoenvironment based analysis of hybrid steam biomass gasification and solid oxide fuel cell system for a multigeneration system

Sentencas: Sensitivity analysis has been performed for the main decision variables of the considered multigeneration system based on energy, exergy, exergoeconomic, exergoenvironmental, emergoeconomic, and emergoenvironmental assessment.
Titulo: A comprehensive exergoenvironment-emergoeconomic-emergoenvironment based analysis of hybrid steam biomass gasification and solid oxide fuel cell system for a multigeneration system
